name: Multisectoral humenitarian assistance including CP and FSL
summary: Harikar NGO in partnership with Save the Children is implementing a project funded by SIDA. This project strives to ensure that protection risks for girls, boys and young people are reduced through improved access to quality integrated child protection and climate-sensitive livelihood services with MHPSS mainstreamed.
objectives: The most vulnerable girls and boys, particularly survivors of SGBV, and children who continue to suffer from the legacies of conflict such as those living with conflict-related disability, CAAFAG, children  with presumed affiliations and their caregivers have access to inclusive and gender-sensitive life-saving, child protection and psychosocial support assistance at the individual and community level
Young people and caregivers affected by conflict are able to meet their basic needs and reintegrate back into their communities.
activities: I support my friend Life skills training
